languages.text: "Насчет вашего участия в триумфе, губернатор, — вы отправитесь с нами в звездную гавань, чтобы оперативно отвечать на вопросы, которые возникнут у меня при досмотре портового терминала. Впрочем, вам стоит показаться подданным хотя бы в конце торжества — это полезно для поддержания порядка. Людям незачем знать, что в управлении миром скоро могут произойти перемены".

"In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."
languages.original_text: "Насчет вашего участия в триумфе, губернатор, — вы отправитесь с нами в звездную гавань, чтобы оперативно отвечать на вопросы, которые возникнут у меня при досмотре портового терминала. Впрочем, вам стоит показаться подданным хотя бы в конце торжества — это полезно для поддержания порядка. Людям незачем знать, что в управлении миром скоро могут произойти перемены".

traits.locale_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the starport terminal. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

languages.text: "Was Euren Anteil an diesem Triumph angeht, Gouverneur: Ihr werdet uns zum Raumhafen begleiten, um mir alle aufkommenden Fragen zu beantworten, während ich das dortige Terminal inspiziere. Das heißt, Ihr solltet gegen Ende der Zeremonie wenigstens einmal vor Euren Untertanen erscheinen ... das wird helfen, die Ordnung zu wahren. Es gibt keinen Grund, die Leute wissen zu lassen, dass ihrer Welt möglicherweise ein baldiger Machtwechsel bevorsteht."
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

traits.locale_text: "Was Euren Anteil an diesem Triumph angeht, Gouverneur: Ihr werdet uns zum Raumhafen begleiten, um mir alle aufkommenden Fragen zu beantworten, während ich das dortige Terminal inspiziere. Das heißt, Ihr solltet gegen Ende der Zeremonie wenigstens einmal vor Euren Untertanen erscheinen ... das wird helfen, die Ordnung zu wahren. Es gibt keinen Grund, die Leute wissen zu lassen, dass ihrer Welt möglicherweise ein baldiger Machtwechsel bevorsteht."

languages.text: « En ce qui concerne votre propre participation au triomphe, gouverneur, vous allez nous accompagner à l'astroport pour répondre à toutes mes questions lors de l'inspection du terminal. Cela étant dit, vous devrez apparaître au moins une fois aux yeux de vos sujets à la fin de la cérémonie afin d'aider à maintenir l'ordre. Inutile de laisser entendre au peuple que ce monde pourrait bientôt changer de dirigeant. »
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

traits.locale_text: « En ce qui concerne votre propre participation au triomphe, gouverneur, vous allez nous accompagner à l'astroport pour répondre à toutes mes questions lors de l'inspection du terminal. Cela étant dit, vous devrez apparaître au moins une fois aux yeux de vos sujets à la fin de la cérémonie afin d'aider à maintenir l'ordre. Inutile de laisser entendre au peuple que ce monde pourrait bientôt changer de dirigeant. »

languages.text: «En cuanto a su participación en el triunfo, gobernador: nos acompañará al puerto estelar a fin de responder oportunamente a todas las preguntas que me surjan mientras inspecciono la terminal. Habiendo dicho eso, debería comparecer ante sus súbditos al menos una vez al final de la ceremonia: eso ayudará a mantener el orden. No existe motivo para dejar que el pueblo sepa que pronto su planeta tendrá un nuevo líder».
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a su participación en el triunfo, gobernador: nos acompañará al puerto estelar a fin de responder oportunamente a todas las preguntas que me surjan mientras inspecciono la terminal. Habiendo dicho eso, debería comparecer ante sus súbditos al menos una vez al final de la ceremonia: eso ayudará a mantener el orden. No existe motivo para dejar que el pueblo sepa que pronto su planeta tendrá un nuevo líder».

languages.text: “关于你参加庆典的事情，总督，你必须陪同我们前往星港。我会检查那边的情况，而你必须及时回答我的所有问题。话虽如此，等到庆典结束时，你需要出现在你的臣民面前，至少一次。这么做有助于维持秩序，没必要让广大民众意识到，这个世界的统治者马上就要换届了。”
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

traits.locale_text: “关于你参加庆典的事情，总督，你必须陪同我们前往星港。我会检查那边的情况，而你必须及时回答我的所有问题。话虽如此，等到庆典结束时，你需要出现在你的臣民面前，至少一次。这么做有助于维持秩序，没必要让广大民众意识到，这个世界的统治者马上就要换届了。”

languages.text: 「総督、あなた自身の勝利への参加についてですが、私がスターポートでターミナルを視察する際に、私が思い付くかもしれない質問に速やかに答えるため、あなたは私たちに同行していただきます。とはいえ、式の終わりに、少なくとも一度は臣民の前に現れるべきです。それが秩序を守る助けになるでしょう。この惑星が近いうちに指導者の交代を迎えるかもしれないことは、民衆に知らせる必要はありません」
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

traits.locale_text: 「総督、あなた自身の勝利への参加についてですが、私がスターポートでターミナルを視察する際に、私が思い付くかもしれない質問に速やかに答えるため、あなたは私たちに同行していただきます。とはいえ、式の終わりに、少なくとも一度は臣民の前に現れるべきです。それが秩序を守る助けになるでしょう。この惑星が近いうちに指導者の交代を迎えるかもしれないことは、民衆に知らせる必要はありません」

languages.text: "Zafer alayına sizin de katılımınızla ilgili olarak Vali Bey... Ben terminali teftiş ederken aklıma gelebilecek tüm sorulara zamanında yanıt alabilmem adına yıldız limanına kadar bize eşlik edeceksiniz. Bununla birlikte törenin sonunda en az bir defa tebaanızın önüne çıkmak durumundasınız ki asayişe zeval gelmesin. İnsanların bu dünyada yakında bir önder değişikliği yaşanabileceğini bilmesine gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "In regards to your own participation in the triumph, Governor: you will accompany us to the starport to provide timely answers to any questions that may occur to me as I inspect the terminal there. That being said, you should appear before your subjects at least once at the end of the ceremony — doing so will help to maintain order. There is no reason to let the people know that the world may soon be in for a change of leadership."

Bununla birlikte törenin sonunda en az bir defa tebaanızın önüne çıkmak durumundasınız ki asayişe zeval gelmesin. İnsanların bu dünyada yakında bir önder değişikliği yaşanabileceğini bilmesine gerek yok."
